member.name: STORAGE_PHYSICAL_NODE_DATA
member.summary: Specifies the physical device data of a storage node.

member.name: STORAGE_PHYSICAL_NODE_DATA.NodeId
member.summary: The hardware ID of the storage node.

member.name: STORAGE_PHYSICAL_NODE_DATA.AdapterCount
member.summary: A value of 0 or 1 that indicates the adapter count in the storage node.

member.name: STORAGE_PHYSICAL_NODE_DATA.AdapterDataLength
member.summary: The data length of the storage adapter in the storage node, in units of kilobytes (1024 bytes).

member.name: STORAGE_PHYSICAL_NODE_DATA.AdapterDataOffset
member.summary: The data offset from the beginning of the data structure. The buffer contains an array of .

member.name: STORAGE_PHYSICAL_NODE_DATA.DeviceCount
member.summary: A value less than or equal to 1.

member.name: STORAGE_PHYSICAL_NODE_DATA.DeviceDataLength
member.summary: The data length of the storage device in the storage node, in units of kilobytes (1024 bytes).

member.name: STORAGE_PHYSICAL_NODE_DATA.DeviceDataOffset
member.summary: The data offset from the beginning of the data structure. The buffer contains an array of .

member.name: STORAGE_PHYSICAL_NODE_DATA.Reserved
member.summary: Specifies if the storage adapter is reserved.
